doc:
Ian Bohen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ian_Bohen 0 Ian Stuart Bohen (born September 24, 1976) is an American actor best known for his recurring role as Peter Hale in MTV's Teen Wolf. Bohen also appeared in a recurring role as Roy Hazelitt, who vied for the same woman as Don Draper, in AMC's Mad Men. Ian_Stuart_Bohen ( born September_24_,_1976 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_recurring_role as Peter_Hale in MTV 's_Teen_Wolf . Bohen also appeared in a_recurring_role as Roy_Hazelitt , who vied for the_same_woman as Don_Draper , in AMC 's_Mad_Men .
